Package com.mikeleith.mockery

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Defaults
    Interface to support specifying custom returned defaults (per-class) for a mock.
    Matchers.BooleanPredicate  
    Matchers.BytePredicate  
    Matchers.CharPredicate  
    Matchers.FloatPredicate  
    Matchers.ShortPredicate  
    MockBenchmark.Target  
    Mockery.Trackable
    Base interface to access all tracking data associated with a mock/spy
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Benchmarks  
    Capture<T>
    Used alongside Mockery.verify to "capture" arguments previously passed to a method
    Defaults.Impl
    Default implementation of Defaults.
    Matchers
    Matching logic so we can specify the return value of mocks when specific parameters are passed.
    Mock<T>
    Class providing methods to override the return value for a mocks method e.g when(foo.doSomething(anyInt())).thenReturn(100) Methods can be chained.
    MockBenchmark  
    MockBenchmark.Impl  
    MockBenchmark.Mocks  
    Mockery
    Mockery is a library for mocking classes when testing.
    Times
    Methods to use when verifying
    Times.Condition
    Utility class to provide a IntPredicate with a human readable toString
